name: HOB Entertainment
overview: HOB Entertainment, an entertainment company, hosts concerts and events to promote music and art in the United States. It also provides facilities for private and corporate events, concerts, meetings, lunches, wedding and rehearsal dinners, and cocktail parties. In addition, the company offers dining facilities. Further, it provides t-shirts, sweats, jackets, hats, collectibles, glassware, edibles, music items, and DVDs online. HOB Entertainment, Inc. was formerly known as House of Blues, Inc. and changed its name in June 1993. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Los Angeles, California. It operates venues in Anaheim, Sunset Strip, and San Diego, California; Atlantic City, New Jersey; Boston, Massachusetts; Chicago, Illinois; Cleveland, Ohio; Dallas and Houston, Texas; Las Vegas, Nevada; Myrtle Beach, South Carolina; New Orleans, Louisiana; and Orlando, Florida. As of November 3, 2006, HOB Entertainment, Inc. is a subsidiary of Live Nation, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: Live Nation Inc acquires HOB Entertainment Inc
